name: KetoWP
description: Adun is a simple and secure WordPress plugin that houses our Agency's in-house custom design (powered by our popular #1 variable-first atomic design framework - KetoCSS). It also has all our pre and post-deployment snippets.

scripts.keto: node src/keto/js/colors.js & node src/keto/js/container.js & node src/keto/js/typography.js & node src/keto/js/type.js

author: Claudius A.
